mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY (MEMBER_NUM, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQUIRY_TYPE, INQUIRY_REGDATE) VALUES (#{memberNum}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, #{inquiryType}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE INQUIRY SET INQUIRY_ANSWER=#{inquiryAnswer}, INQUIRY_STATE='답변완료' WHERE INQUIRY_NUM=#{inquiryNum}
mapper.select: SELECT inquiry_num, inquiry_title, MEMBER.member_num, inquiry_content, inquiry_type, inquiry_state, inquiry_answer, inquiry_regdate, member_email, member_nickname FROM INQUIRY JOIN MEMBER USING (member_num) WHERE INQUIRY_NUM=#{inquiryNum}
SELECT * FROM INQUIRY ORDER BY INQUIRY_REGDATE DESC;
